result.execSummary:
The defendant Jorge Luis Agosto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-Heroin(>10-50g), a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(d)3.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant ordered to submit a DNA sample if not already done. Pay all costs and surcharges, including the mandatory DNA surcharge, to be collected by DOC out of up to 25% prison wages, any balance as a condition of ES. If not paid, a civil judgment to be entered.

Consecutive to any other sentence. Credit
for 0 days time served.

*****9-12-14, Judge Stark, The Court ordered that the defendant's aliases shall be removed from the judgment of conviction ***

superMiscConds.notes:
Conditions to be determined by the Department of Correction, but to include:
Pay balance of all costs and surcharges including the mandatory DNA surcharge. If not paid, a civil judgment to be entered.
Alcohol and drug assessment and comply with any treatment deemed necessary by the department.
Absolute sobriety, no positive results. Random urine screens. No positive results. No illegal drugs. No controlled substances without valid prescription. No contact with drug community.
Seek and maintain full time employment. Cognitive Behavior Therapy.
Defendant advised that he may never again possess firearms or weapons.

supervisions.notes: Defendant does qualify for the Challenge Incarceration Program or the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Program after serving 1/2 initial confinement.

records.addlTxt: Signed Earned Release Program/Substance Abuse Program Order faxed to:  (920) 426-5601, and mailed to:  Drug Abuse Correctional Center, Attn:  Stephanie, PO Box 36, Winnebago, WI  54985-0036.  jm

IT IS ORDERED

that the Department of Corrections will effectuate the change from Confinement to Extended Supervision upon receipt of this Order, determining the actual number of days served in Confinement and changing the remaining Confinement to Extended Supervision.  The number of days that are converted from Confinement Time to Extended Supervision will be determined by a DOC records office staff member and will be based upon actual release date. 

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED

that the Warden/Superintendent of the institution to which the prisoner is assigned shall effect his or her release within SIX (6) working days upon receipt of this Order.

IN ALL OTHER RESPECTS THE ORIGINAL JUDGMENT HEREIN IS AFFIRMED.

Signed and filed, sdg.

DOC is requesting the Court to authorize the inmate's release and conversion of remaining confinement time to extended supervision.  As Br. 35  is not in session, case assigned to Br. 33, Judge Ashley.  jm
records.descr: Pet/determ eligibility for substance abuse program
Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Decision and Order Granting Request to Amend Judgment of Conviction, signed and filed.
It is Hereby Ordered that the defendant's aliases shall be removed from the judgment of conviction. 
Copies mailed to parties.
Per Order of Presiding Judge, Felony Division, this request/motion is hereby assigned to Carolina Stark, Branch 17, calendar successor, for review. mag
Defendant's affidavit.
Defendant's pro se request to remove aliases from judgment of conviction.

Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in court with attorney Russell J Jones.  Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in custody.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: alp     Sentencing proceeded.   The Court sentenced the defendant to a TOTAL LENGTH of imprisonment of 9  years, consecutive to any other sentence.
The INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prisons is 5 years with credit for 0 days 
time served.
The Court orders the defendant to serve a maximum term of EXTENDED SUPERVISION of  4 years.
Conditions of Extended Supervision to be determined by the Dept. of Corrections, but to include:
*
*Alcohol and drug assessment and comply with any treatment deemed necessary by the department.
*Absolute sobriety, no positive results.
*Random urine screens.  No positive results.
*No illegal drugs.
*No controlled substances without valid prescription.
*No contact with drug community.
*Seek and maintain full time employment.
*Cognitive Behavior Therapy.


- Defendant ordered to submit a DNA sample if not already done.
- Defendant advised that he/she may never again possess firearms or weapons.
- Civil rights suspended until reinstated.  Order received and filed.
- Pay all costs and surcharges, including the mandatory DNA surcharge, to be collected by DOC out of up to 25% prison wages, any balance as a condition of ES.  If not paid, a civil judgment to be entered.
- Defendant does qualify for the Challenge Incarceration Program and the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Program after serving 1/2 initial confinement.
- Received and filed:  Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence; Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.

Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in court with attorney Russell J Jones.  Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in custody.  Paul M Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin (for ADA Crivello)  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he/she is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.  Firearms warning given.  Voting admonishment given.  DNA notification given.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in court with attorney Russell J Jones.  Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in custody.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant no longer wishes to enter a guilty plea and requests a jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 2, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Pleah date move to 05-14-2014 at 08:30 am in Branch 26.

Attorney Russell J Jones in court, defendant Jorge Luis Agosto not in court, in custody.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant not produced.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 6, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Per defense counsel, case will not be a motion, but a plea instead.

Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in court with attorney Russell J.A. Jones.  Defendant Jorge Luis Agosto in custody.  Tyrone Martin St Junior, appearing for Laura Crivello, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
